amendment.description: Amendment requires that at least 50 percent of the funds made available for the Farmers Market Nutrition Program be reserved for seniors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to require that at least 50 percent of the funds made available for the Farmers Market Nutrition Program be reserved for seniors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
